path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Solidity_Finance/Defi Kingdoms - Solidity Finance Smart Contract Audit.pdf

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: Authorized addresses can change the Profile contract used, which could change or erase existing profile data.

findings.title: Authorized Users Can Update Any Fee Address
findings.description: Authorized users have the capability to update any fee address at any time without restrictions.

findings.title: Authorized users can transfer ownership of the JewelToken contract at any time
findings.description: Authorized users have the ability to transfer ownership of the JewelToken contract at any time.

findings.title: No cap on minted tokens if authorized users update the limit
findings.description: Authorized users can update the cap on the number of Jeweltokens that can be minted at any time, potentially leading to unlimited token creation.

findings.title: Authorized Users Can Lock Any User's JewelTokens
findings.description: Authorized users have the ability to lock a specified amount of any user's JewelTokens.

findings.title: Substantial power in the ecosystem lies with the project team
findings.description: The project team has substantial power in the ecosystem due to their ability to control certain aspects of the contracts.
